title: skins
body: is there an easy way to know my skins? I got a bunch of new ones and my client bugged, have no idea what I got.

replies.body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/11/116-pbe-update.html#tab

Soon (TM)

But for now, as BlueFox suggested, they should show up in Purchase History.

Look at your recently purchased in the settings tab 

that should help if not GLHF
